overview: Canvas is an athlete driven ski film that showcases all aspects of skiing. These skier's travelled from far and wide to find desirable conditions that best suit their disciplines. As they venture into the unknown in search of deep pow, big air, and self satisfaction they find themselves leaving a mark on the snowy slopes creating a masterpiece in which they call their Canvas.  Featuring: Alexi Godbout, Stan Rey, JF Houle, Josh Daiek, Vincent Gagnier, Alex Beaulieu-Marchand, Dean Bercovich, Dana Flahr and Maxim Arsenault.
title: Canvas
